text: So if I go barber and pay him for the service of cutting my hair  I don't need to pay GST?
Thx 🙏🏻 lol at least I learn. Rather be a fool for 5 mins than to be a fool forever 😬
Businesses taxable >= $1m need to register for GST. GST can only be charged by businesses with GST registered.
Yes I'm aware  I was just giving an example to prove my point 😂
